amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to develop or submit a proposal to expand the authorized uses of the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund described in section 9505(c) of the Internal Revenue Code (26 U.S.C. 9505(c)).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 80 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to develop or submit a proposal to expand the authorized uses of the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund described in section 9505(c) of the Internal Revenue Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Cravaack.
